Package com.uno.database

Interface Database

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseImpl
public interface Database
An interface that has all methods for getting items from and to the database.

  • Method Details

    • getMenuItems

      ArrayList<MenuItem> getMenuItems()
      Method that returns a list of menu item object from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of menuItem objects.

    • createOrder

      void createOrder(Order order)
      Method that creates a new Order entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The entry that will be inserted in the database.

    • createPreOrder

      void createPreOrder(int orderNum, int reservationNum)
      a method for creating a pre-order
      Parameters:
      orderNum - number of the corresponding order
      reservationNum - number of the corresponding reservation

    • editOrder

      void editOrder(Order newOrder)
      a method that edits an order in the database
      Parameters:
      newOrder - takes the new version of the order as a parameter

    • createAccount

      void createAccount(Account account)
      A method that takes account object and send it to the database.
      Parameters:
      account - An account object that will be sent.

    • createReservation

      void createReservation(Reservation reservation)
      method that creates a new entry in the database
      Parameters:
      reservation - takes a reservation as a parameter

    • login

      Account login(String phoneNumber, String password)
      a method for logging in
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - takes phone number as a parameter
      password - takes password as a parameter
      Returns:
      returns an account

    • getOrders

      ArrayList<Order> getOrders()
